item.title: Polaroid Land Cameras
item.description: A short History of Land Cameras. So first, let me welcome you to the club! Old school Polaroid cameras are my favorite! I got my first 103 land camera in the summer of 2014 and since then I have aquired 20+ cameras. I have been taking instant film pictures as often as I can. Polaroid is a company that was founded in 1931 by Edwin Land, the king of instant film!
